reviewText: From the back of the Facets Video: "Video artist Woody Vasulka's experiment with narrativity through electronic tools is presented in this 'operatic' work that evokes the friendship between Hector Berlioz (played by composer/performer Robert Ashley) and violinist Niccolo Paganini (played by video artist Ernest Gusella), whose ill health, loss of voice and gambling habits led to his death at an early age..."
